text:
.@NC_Governor responds to RNC:

"As much as we want the conditions surrounding COVID-19 to be favorable enough for you to hold (a full) Convention ...

Neither public health officials nor I will risk the health and safety of North Carolinians by providing the guarantee you seek." https://t.co/5xdKp78jN0
